ROYAL INSTITUTION CHRISTMAS LECTURES

The Royal Institution Christmas Lectures[12] are a series of lectures on a
single topic each, which have been held at the Royal Institution in London
each year since 1825. The lectures present scientific subjects to a general
audience, including young people, in an informative and entertaining manner.
Take a look at Highlights from the Christmas Lectures Archive[13] (51
videos) on YouTube's Royal Institution Channel[14].
Visit YouTube's Popular Royal Institution Christmas Lectures & RoyalInstitution[15] for more.
